refnamediv.refpurpose: Reads the specified file and sets the current MGED view to agree with the parameters in the file.

refsection.para: Reads the specified file and sets the current MGED view to agree with the parameters in the file. The format of the file is expected to be as produced by the savekey command.
The example shows the use of the rmats command to read a specified file and set the current MGED view according to the parameters in that file.

info.title: Set the current MGED view according to the parameters in a specified file.

example.para: Reads the file named key_file and sets the current MGED viewing direction according to the parameters found there.

refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
